tool_description: Get 20 years historical weather data in Europe + Pollen + UV + Air Quality data
name: History
title: History

api_list.name: hourlyWeather
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the historical weather on hourly level for a given day for a given location (latitude and longitude)

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude in decimal format of the requested point

required_parameters.name: parameters
required_parameters.description: Define the parameter, you wish to request. Allowed options are \"all\", \"air_quality\", \"anomaly\", \"astronomy\", \"weather\", \"signal\", \"pollen\"

required_parameters.name: day
required_parameters.description: The requested day in the format \"YYYYmmdd\"

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: The longitude in decimal format of the requested point

schema.description: Hourly values of the the requested parameters

api_list.name: hourlyWeatherZip
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the historical weather on hourly level for a given day for a given location (country and zip-code)

required_parameters.name: parameters
required_parameters.description: Define the parameter, you wish to request. Allowed options are \\\"all\\\", \\\"air_quality\\\", \\\"anomaly\\\", \\\"astronomy\\\", \\\"weather\\\", \\\"signal\\\", \\\"pollen\\\"

required_parameters.name: zip-code
required_parameters.description: The postal code for the requested country

required_parameters.name: day
required_parameters.description: The requested day in the format \\\"YYYYmmdd\\\"

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The ISO Alpha-2 code of the country

test_endpoint.message: You have exceeded the DAILY quota for Requests on your current plan, BASIC. Upgrade your plan at https://rapidapi.com/wettercom-wettercom-data/api/history3

schema.description: Hourly values of the the requested parameters

api_list.name: dailyWeatherZip

required_parameters.name: country

required_parameters.name: zip-code
required_parameters.description: The postal code for the requested country

required_parameters.name: parameters

required_parameters.name: day
required_parameters.description: The requested day in the format \\\"YYYYmmdd\\\"

api_list.name: dailyWeatherSeries
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the historical weather for a given series of days for a given location (latitude and longitude)

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: The longitude in decimal format of the requested point

required_parameters.name: start_day
required_parameters.description: The requested start day in the format \"YYYYmmdd\"

required_parameters.name: end_day
required_parameters.description: The requested end day in the format \"YYYYmmdd\"

required_parameters.name: parameters
required_parameters.description: Define the parameter, you wish to request. Allowed options are \"all\", \"air_quality\", \"anomaly\", \"astronomy\", \"weather\", \"signal\", \"pollen\", \"occurrence\"

required_parameters.name: lat
